{"title":"Anioł i Diabeł","altTitle":"Piwa, nalejcie piwa","artists":["{\"name\":\"Anna Borowa\",\"type\":\"sł\"}","{\"name\":\"Andrzej Zieliński\",\"type\":\"muz\"}","{\"name\":\"Łucja
